pr_title: EBP: improve edit attachment dialog styles

timeline.message: Add margin variables and refactor to use them

Apply fileHandler styles

- Increase window size
- Add shadow border
- fix padding
- Remove unnecessary box shadow within fileHandler
- Hide redundant string that appears twice (Upload files from your computer)
Include the margin of the window

Increase default chromedriver window size

The broken tests were caused by the chromedriver window size
being smaller than the attachment dialog size. Upsizing to 1920x1080.
Expand out taxonomy browser dialog, fix issue with PowerSearchTest
Change window size to 1300x900 for autotests

Remove fancybox changes

Fancybox is too tied into the rest of openEQUELLA to change
without breaking things. Better to leave it alone and be more specific
rather than fix each place where it breaks.

Remove fancybox-img styles

No longer needed as the rest of the styles were simplified.

Reduce size slightly so we can keep the autotest window the same size

Keeps causing errors in old UI, so I decided to leave it alone

timeline.bodyText: This has been repeated. Looks like a good candidate for a mixin.
timeline.author: edalex-ian

timeline.bodyText: This appears to be the same width as .fileHandler. I'm gathering that is deliberate, and so should share a var?
timeline.author: edalex-ian

timeline.bodyText: This is an interesting one, seeing the width here is matching the .fileHanlder I'm gathering this is also essentially matching the height but with an offset of 18px. It may therefore be worthwhile having a var for that standard height, and then expressing this as that height minus 18px. Although 18px seems very similar to 16px, so that makes me wonder if the offset should be the standard doubleMargin?
timeline.author: edalex-ian
